ActJudges Act
SubjectBarbara Anne Gordon ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Ian M. Gordon **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to BARBARA ANNE GORDON, survivor of the Hon. Ian M. Gordon, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective March 13, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
